transcript:
i'm a psychologist and here are five
warning signs of addiction that everyone
needs to know about number one you start
to becoming secretive or lying to loved
ones about how much you do it number two
you're unable to stop even when you want
to number three you spend much of your
time craving or worrying about when
you're next going to get the chance to
do it and number four is having a
negative impact on important aspects of
your life like relationships or your
physical and mental health and number
five prioritizing it has caused you to
neglect other responsibilities like
studying or performing at work
